title: Council Decision of 26 February 1996 appointing members and alternates of the Advisory Committee on Education and Training in the Field of Architecture
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 26 February 1996 appointing members and alternates of the Advisory Committee on Education and Training in the Field of Architecture (96/C 74/01)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
The following are hereby appointed members and alternates of the Advisory Committee on Education and Training in the Field of Architecture for the period 26 February 1996 to 25 February 1999.
A. >TABLE>
B. >TABLE>
C. >TABLE>
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 February 1996.
For the Council
The President
W. LUCHETTI
(1) OJ No L 223, 21. 8.1985, p. 26.
(2) OJ No C 182, 13. 7. 1991, p. 1.
